mapper.select: SELECT cfm.check_file_manage_id, cfm.check_manage_code FROM check_file_manage cfm LEFT JOIN devices_type dt ON cfm.devices_type_id = dt.devices_type_id
SELECT dm.devices_manage_id,coalesce(dm.device_name, dt.name) as name,dm.manage_code as sheet_file_name FROM devices_manage dm LEFT JOIN devices_type dt ON dm.devices_type_id = dt.devices_type_id
mapper.insert: REPLACE INTO checked_file_storage (check_file_manage_id, filing_date, devices_manage_id, branch, start_record_date, storage_file_name) VALUES (#{check_file_manage_id}, #{filing_date}, #{devices_manage_id}, 2, #{start_record_date}, #{storage_file_name})
